ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: ... o NO DROP is the way to go. Level caps *suck*, take *all* the fun out of the game. Why should I have to wait until 30 or 35 for, say, a Blackened Iron
ygData.messageBody:
--- EverQuest-owner@... wrote:
> Possible answers are:
>
> o NO DROP is the way to go.
> o Hmm, level caps on items, that's better..
> o Why not both at once?

o NO DROP is the way to go.

Level caps *suck*, take *all* the fun out of the game.
Why should I have to wait until 30 or 35 for, say, a
Blackened Iron Crown or Crested Helm if I can afford
to buy, or can get a group to get, it at 20 or 25?
I've played MUDs with level caps and would probably
seriously consider quitting EQ if they institute them
here.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
